title: Berkeley All Blues
text: The Berkeley All Blues are a women's <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> club based in <a href="Berkeley%2C%20California">Berkeley, California</a>. They were founded in 1978 and are founding members of the <a href="Women%27s%20Premier%20League%20Rugby">Women's Premier League Rugby</a>. They field three teams throughout the year, in the WPL, Division II, and in <a href="Rugby%20sevens">Sevens</a>. The All Blues have won a total of 16 National Championships, they include the 2011 and 2012 Women's Premier League Championships and the 2011 and 2013 Women's <a href="USA%20Rugby%20Club%207s">Club 7s National Championships</a>.
